markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Numerian Steel Breastplate](/Equipment.aspx?ID=811)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Scenario #1-24: Lightning Strikes, Stars Fall](/Sources.aspx?ID=46) pg. 32</row>

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_ is constructed from the salvaged armor plating of one of Numeria's large robots. It protects the wearer from harsh elements and common laser fire, granting the wearer fire resistance 5.

<document level="2" id="action-627" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Numerian Steel Breastplate
